data.name: ET Superman : Wrath of Tyrannosaurus Rex
data.detailed_description:
An adventurer with super ability to control objects, a dinosaur park that has been abandoned for many years, a group of ferocious and brutal mutant Tyrannosaurus Rex. Under various coincidence, adventurer Ethan Pitt came to the dinosaur park to collect the embryos of mutant Tyrannosaurus Rex. He knew it was a near death adventure, but he had no choice, because he

His super ability made him suffer from a terminal disease. He had to cooperate with Rhodes dinosaur company (the manufacturer of mutant Tyrannosaurus Rex) to obtain dinosaur embryos and extract gene fragments from the genes of these embryos to cure Ethan Pitt's terminal disease.


In the game, you will play the adventurer Ethan Pitt. After you collected the Tyrannosaurus Rex embryos, you were ambushed by the Tyrannosaurus Rex, Tyrannosaurus Rex is frantically searching for your whereabouts in the abandoned city. Your only hope is to find the rescue workers put in the city
Aircraft backpack. However, the aircraft backpack was accidentally damaged by pterosaurs in the process of falling, and the aircraft and batteries were scattered
Everywhere in the city, you have to collect these batteries one by one and put them back into the aircraft before you can start the aircraft to escape there.

The game provides PC players with exhaustive customization options. You can set attributes for each Tyrannosaurus Rex, including itsStrength, speed, search method, injury degree, body shape, skin, etc
You can also set different weather for the scene, including sunny days, rainy days and rainstorms

With 22 customized options, you can set different thrill levels and styles for each game, and you will experience extremely thrilling adventures.

An adventurer with super ability to control objects, a dinosaur park that has been abandoned for many years, a group of ferocious and brutal mutant Tyrannosaurus Rex. Under various coincidence, adventurer Ethan Pitt came to the dinosaur park to collect the embryos of mutant Tyrannosaurus Rex. He knew it was a near death adventure, but he had no choice, because he

His super ability made him suffer from a terminal disease. He had to cooperate with Rhodes dinosaur company (the manufacturer of mutant Tyrannosaurus Rex) to obtain dinosaur embryos and extract gene fragments from the genes of these embryos to cure Ethan Pitt's terminal disease.


In the game, you will play the adventurer Ethan Pitt. After you collected the Tyrannosaurus Rex embryos, you were ambushed by the Tyrannosaurus Rex, Tyrannosaurus Rex is frantically searching for your whereabouts in the abandoned city. Your only hope is to find the rescue workers put in the city

With 22 customized options, you can set different thrill levels and styles for each game, and you will experience extremely thrilling adventures.
data.short_description: Peter, who has been collecting dinosaur eggs, went to the abandoned Tyrannosaurus Rex park. Unfortunately, he was trapped by the mutant Tyrannosaurus Rex. The ferocious mutant Tyrannosaurus Rex chases Ethan Pitt. Ethan Pitt needs to use all his wisdom and ability to escape.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: 2 ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 880 GTX |ATI Radeon HD 4770
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: 3 ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 950 GTX |ATI Radeon HD 677
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
